title: i got a pbe confirmation email
body:
but when i click the link to make my account it says my confirmation is still pending wtf

can i get some help?

replies.body: I looked into this for you and don't see an approval for PBE.  If you received an email, double check any other accounts you might have registered under.  Let me know if that clears things up.

thanks for looking and i have checked the email again but i have no other LOL account that i used

update: i sent in a support ticket and they said i was sent a pbe approval email due to a bug but im still ineligible for pbe which is upsetting, im not sure if this is a confirmed thing so i would love to know if anyone else has been getting this bug 

thanks for the reply Porocles ^__^

That's strange to hear.  Unless there's another bug that I'm missing, the account you're posting from shouldn't be impacted.  If you have a ticket number, I'd love to take a look.  From what I see, though, the account you're posting from definitely wasn't accepted.  Let me know.
also the email starts off by saying my summoner name Azteryz so im pretty sure the case that i might of switched accounts is there LOL

Thanks for the follow-up!  I looked into this for you, but don't have much more context to offer beyond what the specialist provided in the ticket.  While you still have that ticket open, continue corresponding with us there with any concerns.  We'll get back to you there!

yea thats what it said responded by huckleberrynoon 

request number is 29532525 anything to help out 

 if it is a bug hopefully its a once in a blue moon case and not many other people are getting it as well
how long have you been waiting for an pbe account its been over a year for me
same i was honestly surprised when i saw it
